snippet: Locked in a tight race, both candidates are raising red flags with voters. Most voters think Donald J. Trump is a risky choice and does not have the temperament and personality to be president, but Hillary Clinton continues to struggle with broad ...
lead_paragraph: Locked in a tight race, both candidates are raising red flags with voters. Most voters think Donald J. Trump is a risky choice and does not have the temperament and personality to be president, but Hillary Clinton continues to struggle with broad perceptions that she is not trustworthy and cannot bring real change to Washington, the latest New York Times/CBS News poll found.

headline.main: A New York Times/CBS News Poll on the Presidential Race
